docs.snippet: To most Americans, the World Cup is a trophy in another world, one where soccer is supreme. But as the United States' best known soccer player, Kyle Rote Jr. understand that world. He also foresees the time when the United States will be a contender....
docs.lead_paragraph: To most Americans, the World Cup is a trophy in another world, one where soccer is supreme. But as the United States' best known soccer player, Kyle Rote Jr. understand that world. He also foresees the time when the United States will be a contender. In that connection he talks admiringly of the Netherlands team that will oppose West Germany in Munich tomorrow for the World. Cup title.
docs.abstract: D Anderson on US soccer player Kyle Rote Jr's thoughts concerning World Cup and future of Amer soccer (M)

docs.snippet: A former undercover agent for the Central Intelligence Agency in Latin America has written what his associates describe as a major expose of the agency's Latin-American activities in the 1960's, including an assertion that the agency participated in...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former undercover agent for the Central Intelligence Agency in Latin America has written what his associates describe as a major expose of the agency's Latin-American activities in the 1960's, including an assertion that the agency participated in the murder of some of its employes.
docs.abstract: rept on Watergate-CIA by Sen Howard H Baker Jr discloses that overseas offices of Washington-based public relations firm, Robert R Mullen & Co, had been serving as 'cover' offices for CIA employes, and that a Mullen office in Far East was shut down by CIA because of fear that cover operations may have been compromised by former CIA undercover agent Philip B F Agee during his 3 trips to Cuba since '71 (S)

docs.snippet: Lancy Smith, medalist in the qualifying round, advanced to the second round of match play in the Women's Western Golf Association amateur championship today by defeating Pam Palmieri of Santa Rosa, Calif., 5 and 3. Miss Smith, of Snyder, N. Y., will...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lancy Smith, medalist in the qualifying round, advanced to the second round of match play in the Women's Western Golf Association amateur championship today by defeating Pam Palmieri of Santa Rosa, Calif., 5 and 3. Miss Smith, of Snyder, N. Y., will face Mrs. Alice Dye tomorrow morning. Mrs. Dye, a nine-time Indiana state champion, eliminated Judith Oliver of Pittsburgh, 2 and 1.
docs.abstract: Sen, 50-42, approves Sen Humphrey amendment to bill to create US Sports Bd and calling for binding arbitration in amateur sports disputes; bill, offered by Sen Pearson, would create bd with broad authority to issue and revoke charters of nonprofit orgns and governing bodies (S)

docs.snippet: " I did not write this book for the K.G.B. I wrote it for revolutionary organizations in the United States, in Latin America and everywhere else. I wrote it as a contribution to the socialist revolution."
docs.lead_paragraph: " I did not write this book for the K.G.B. I wrote it for revolutionary organizations in the United States, in Latin America and everywhere else. I wrote it as a contribution to the socialist revolution."
docs.abstract: ex-CIA agent Philip B F Agee discusses why he has decided to write book describing CIA's operations in 3 countries where he was stationed: Ecuador, Uruguay and Mexico; book recounts in detail his experiences with CIA, including his recruitment and his training and operations he knew of at his 3 posts; says he does not expect diffulty with publication that Victor L Marchetti and John Marks are experiencing with their book about CIA because he is living in GB (L)
